feed.title: Immich Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Immich: v1.125.1
entry.content:
v1.125.1

There was a hiccup with the release pipeline for v1.125.0 so we have to change the version

[!IMPORTANT] If you are running remote machine learning, please make sure the remote service pulls the latest version.

Highlights

Welcome to release v1.125.1 of Immich. The release improves how the server queries the database, using a type-safe query builder, Kysely, instead of relying on the magic of TypeORM. Many queries have been given a speed boost to be much faster; some got several times faster. You should see a quicker app experience overall. It has been the work for the last couple of months and a foundation we have been building for many changes in the coming months to the data model of the whole app, which is needed to enable some long-awaited features. Kudos to the entire team for completing it. Alongside that improvement, this release also brings new features, enhancements, and bug fixes. Please see some of the highlights below:

  • Node.js security update
  • Share-to mechanism on the mobile app
  • Enable slideshow everywhere on the web app.
  • Fixed a bug where the Android app cannot get newly taken photos from the gallery. However, this fix requires us to roll back another mechanism that allows the app to choose empty albums as targets for backup.
  • Fixed a bug where playing particular video codecs would crash the Android mobile app.

Node.js security update

This release includes a Node.js security update. While we don‚Äôt believe any of these vulnerabilities affect Immich, we still recommend updating soon to avoid any risk.

Share-to Immich

You can now directly share media from other apps to Immich without saving them to the phone‚Äôs local gallery first.

[!IMPORTANT]

For uploading photos from the gallery, it is still recommeded to use the built-in backup feature since the share-to mechanism that can cause mismatching upload status. Additionally, iOS defaults to sharing an exported JPEG image instead of the original for formats like HEIC. You can change this by tapping ‚ÄúOptions‚Äù near the top of the iOS sharing menu and selecting ‚ÄúCurrent‚Äù instead of ‚ÄúAutomatic‚Äù.

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/da14a9f9-5087-42e3-a636-bd6863df6d26

Slideshow everywhere

You can now toggle the slideshow mode from all the views on the web app.

Lens information

This release includes the lens information in the detail panel for our photographer users, making it easier to know which of your favorite lenses was used to capture the photo.

Support Immich

If you find the project helpful, you can support Immich by purchasing a product key at https://buy.immich.app/.

Cheers! üçª

What's Changed

üö® Breaking Changes

  • chore(server)!: default max bitrate unit to kbps by @mertalev in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15264
  • feat: better spec urls by @jrasm91 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15487

üöÄ Features

  • feat: Upgrade devcontainer setup by @Zer0x00 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/14419
  • feat(web): immich-ui components by @jrasm91 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/14263
  • feat(mobile): share to mechanism by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15229
  • feat: Allow multiple ML models to be preloaded by @1-tempest in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15418

üåü Enhancements

  • refactor(server): use kysely by @mertalev in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/12857
  • feat: #15237 toggle password visibility on shared albums by @imakida in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15238
  • feat(web): Slideshow is enabled everywhere. It no longer needs assetStore. by @matitalatina in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15077
  • feat: Add additional env variables for Machine Learning by @1-tempest in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15326
  • feat(web): Context menu scrolls on small devices by @matitalatina in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15367
  • feat: Add additional env variables to ML container by @1-tempest in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15398
  • feat: Add rule on robots.txt to allow robots access og tags by @r1235613 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15470
  • feat(web): Show lens model in the asset viewer detail panel by @bxtdvd in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15460

üêõ Bug fixes

  • fix(mobile): 15072 Fix issue with boolean filters filtering out results when they shouldn't by @Tyris in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15208
  • fix(web): escape key to clear selection and go to previous page (#15142) by @jinxuan-owyong in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15219
  • fix(mobile): don't crash android app when video player throws exception by @mertalev in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15236
  • fix(web): mismatched deviceAssetId when uploading images by @jinxuan-owyong in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15130
  • fix(cli): handle folders with single quotes by @desmondgc in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15283
  • fix(web): end selection after click when choosing thumbnail, and notify by @imakida in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15373
  • fix(web): map settings by @jrasm91 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15375
  • fix(mobile): 14983 Images upload to shared album with common name by @Tyris in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15127
  • fix(web): Update asset count when deleting assets from person page by @imakida in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15416
  • fix(web): scrolling memory timeline reset position by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15429
  • fix(mobile): Cannot type date format on Samsung phone by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15430
  • fix(deps): use node-addon-api v8 by @dotlambda in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15438
  • fix(server): searching for multiple people yields false positives by @dav-wolff in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15447
  • fix(mobile): cannot get new photos on Android by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15461
  • fix: incorrect event configuration by @jrasm91 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15530

üìö Documentation

  • chore(docs): clarify experimental network features by @mmomjian in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15228
  • docs: clarify filesystem backup paths by @bo0tzz in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15243
  • fix(docs): Fix link label to refer to correct location on page by @austin-dudzik in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15279
  • fix(docs): fix admonition in mobile section by @Dr-Electron in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15291
  • fix(docs): database name for restore commands by @mmomjian in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15276
  • fix(docs): Update unraid.md to use correct image url by @swils23 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15427
  • fix: grammar on docs homepage by @aaronjrodrigues in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15455
  • fix: broken link on monitoring page by @jsloyer in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15478
  • feat(docs): CIFS/Samba in-Docker example by @mmomjian in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15502

üåê Translations

  • chore(web): update translations by @weblate in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15145
  • chore(web): update translations by @weblate in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15335

New Contributors

  • @jinxuan-owyong made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15219
  • @fholzer made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15266
  • @desmondgc made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15283
  • @austin-dudzik made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15279
  • @Dr-Electron made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15291
  • @Zer0x00 made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/14419
  • @yonran made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/12794
  • @1-tempest made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15326
  • @swils23 made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15427
  • @dav-wolff made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15447
  • @r1235613 made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15470
  • @jsloyer made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15478
  • @bxtdvd made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15460

Full Changelog: https://github.com/immich-app/immich/compare/v1.124.2...v1.125.0

entry.title: New release for Immich: v1.125.2
entry.content:
v1.125.2

This release addresses the following issues, most of which originate from our migration to Kysely.

  • Fixed a bug where the timeline shows a placeholder in some sections
  • Fixed a bug where using server URL with sslmode doesn't get parsed correctly
  • Fixed a bug where LivePhotos doesn't generate thumbnails
  • Fixed a bug where no EXIF data is returned for the deduplication view
  • Fixed a bug where albums with archived assets don't show up on the mobile app
  • Fixed a bug where hard refresh only refreshed assets and not albums
  • Fixed a bug where the updatedAt column doesn't update on some assets and album actions
  • Fixed a bug where searchRandom doesn't return the correct data format

Thank you for reporting the bugs you have found! We added a treat to the login page as a thank you :smile:

Support Immich

If you find the project helpful, you can support Immich by purchasing a product key at https://buy.immich.app/.

Cheers! üçª

What's Changed

üåü Enhancements

  • feat(web): neon light behinds auth forms by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15570

üêõ Bug fixes

  • fix(mobile): translation (no /api, experimental features) by @mmomjian in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15600
  • fix(server): getTimeBuckets not handling boolean filters correctly by @mertalev in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15567
  • fix(web): auth page padding by @jrasm91 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15569
  • fix(server): set updatedAt on updates by @mertalev in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15573
  • fix(server): Fix for sorting faces during merging by @Lukasdotcom in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15571
  • fix(server): searchRandom response by @mertalev in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15580
  • fix: login page by @jrasm91 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15613
  • fix(mobile): full refresh doesn't get albums by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15560
  • fix(server): link live photos by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15612
  • fix: demo login page by @jrasm91 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15616
  • fix(server): no exif metadata in the deduplication utility by @mertalev in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15585
  • fix(mobile): deletion of single assets by @Saschl in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15597
  • fix(server): failed to get albums with archived assets by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15611
  • fix(server): migration mentions public schema by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15622
  • fix(mobile): failed to load ga/gl locale by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15623
  • fix(server): sslmode not working by @mertalev in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15587

Full Changelog: https://github.com/immich-app/immich/compare/v1.125.1...v1.125.2

entry.title: New release for Immich: v1.125.3
entry.content:
v1.125.3

This release continues the bug-squashing effort from migration to Kysely.

  • Fixed an issue where changing the machine learning model doesn't change the vector size requirement
  • Fixed an issue where the bulk location edit triggered an error
  • Fixed an issue where the album cannot be loaded in the mobile app if any of the assets in the album are in the trash
  • Fixed an issue where searchRandom endpoint doesn't return randomize items
  • Fixed some issues regarding the timezone topic

Support Immich

If you find the project helpful, you can support Immich by purchasing a product key at https://buy.immich.app/.

Cheers! üçª

What's Changed

üåü Enhancements

  • chore(server): print stack in case of worker error by @etnoy in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15632
  • fix: increase upload timeout by @jdicioccio in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15588
  • fix(mobile): improve timezone picker by @gaganyadav80 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15615

üêõ Bug fixes

  • fix(server): changing vector dim size by @mertalev in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15630
  • fix(server): bulk update location by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15642
  • fix(server): do not reset fileCreatedDate by @C-Otto in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15650
  • fix(server): do not count deleted assets for album summary by @C-Otto in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15668
  • fix(server): avoid duplicate rows in album queries by @mertalev in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15670
  • fix(web): neon overflow on mobile screen by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15676
  • fix(server): /search/random API returns same assets every call by @sudbrack in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15682

New Contributors

  • @jdicioccio made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15588
  • @idkwhyiusethisname made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15637
  • @gaganyadav80 made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15615
  • @ferraridamiano made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15683
  • @sudbrack made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15682

Full Changelog: https://github.com/immich-app/immich/compare/v1.125.2...v1.125.3

entry.title: New release for Immich: v1.125.5
entry.content:
v1.125.5

We were about to release v1.125.4, then we found and fixed some more bugs, v1.125.5 it is!

  • Fixed a bug where the album page cannot be accessed if any album with its assets is in the trash.
  • Fixed a bug where deduplication detection doesn't return any result
  • Fixed a bug where the date picker component caused a rendering error if the app language was not in English

What's Changed

üêõ Bug fixes

  • fix(web): sort folders by @C-Otto in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15691
  • fix(server): cannot render album page when all assets of an album are in trash by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15690
  • fix(server): duplicate detection by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15727
  • fix(mobile): locale option causes the datetime filter error out by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15704

Full Changelog: https://github.com/immich-app/immich/compare/v1.125.3...v1.125.5

entry.title: New release for Immich: v1.125.6
entry.content:
v1.125.6

  • Fixed a bug where thumbnail generation job queue all person faces at midnight

What's Changed

üêõ Bug fixes

  • fix(server): person thumbnail generation always being queued by @mertalev in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15734

Full Changelog: https://github.com/immich-app/immich/compare/v1.125.5...v1.125.6
